(Sorry I haven't been posting. I had a TON of work to do. I'm tryin to play 
catch-up, so if any of my info contradicts with the story line let me know. 
I had to skim through about 80 e-mails before I found the ones that applied 
to me. Thanx!)

Anix/Tavatron:

Anix heard Megatron's call over her com:

"On my way. We'll try and fix the speeder later (assuming Shredder is still 
with her), right now Megatron needs us."

Anix transformed to beast mode and scurried off in the direction of the ark.

************************************

Tavatron:

Tavatron dropped to the ground, avoiding the majority of BrightBlades' 
shots. The last one, however, connected with her side. Tavatron clutched her 
injured side, the smell of burning fur filled her nostrils. Sometimes her 
beast mode was really annoying! She tried to stop the flow of mech-fluid, 
her ribs, still aching from the previous battle, were now broken again.

"I am not weak!" Tavatron crouched behind what remained of the boulder and 
waited until BrightBlade was at Gangon's side. She raised her head above the 
boulder, charged her optic lasers to full power, and fired, this time making 
sure her aim was true.
